1325:4: saptākāraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu vātsalyaṃ pravartate yena vātsalyenopetā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante|
1325:8: ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca|
1325:9: na ca punarbodhisattvasya sattveṣu yogarahitaṃ vātsalyaṃ pravartate tadyathā adharme'vinaye'satyasamudācāre asthāne samādāpanatāyai|
1325:10: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate|
1325:11: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ|
1325:12: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ|
1325:13: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam|
1325:14: tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti|
1325:16: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ|
1325:17: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante|
1325:18: tatra śraddhāpūrvaṃko dharmavicayapūrvakaśca buddhadharmeṣu yo'dhimokṣaḥ pratyavagamo niścayo bodhisattvasya so'dhyāśaya ityucyate|
1325:19: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ|
1325:21: agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ nigṛhītāśayaḥ sahajaścāśayaḥ|
1325:22: tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so'gryāśaya ityucyate|
1325:25: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo'dhyāśayo'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate|
1325:26: buddhabodhisattvānāmacintye'bhijñāprabhāve sahaje vā prabhāve yo'dhyāśayo'yaṃ prabhāvāśaya ityucyate|
1325:29: sattveṣveva nirāmiṣacittatā iṣṭe ca vipāke niṣpratibaddhacittatā vinirmuktāśaya ityucyate|
1325:30: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yā citaikāntikatāyaṃ dṛḍhāśaya ityucyate|
1325:35: tatra yo hi [a] śuddhāśayaḥ sa eva nigṛhī [tāśaya] ityucyate pratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyatayā|
1325:36: yaḥ punaḥ śuddhaḥ suśuddhaścādhyāśayaḥ sa sahajo'dhyāśaya ityucyate prakṛtyā tanmayatayā āśrayasusaṃniviṣṭatayā ca|
1325:37: ityebhirbodhisattvāḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayaiḥ sarvabhūmigataiḥ samāsato daśakṛtyāni kurvanti|
1325:42: pāramitāśayena kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāsātatyakriyayā'pramādavihāriṇo bhavanti paramāpramādavihāriṇaśca|
1325:45: prabhāvādhyāśayena ghanarasaṃ ca śāsane prasādaṃ pravedayanti|
1325:46: bhāvanāyāṃ ca sārasaṃjñinaḥ spṛhājātā bahulaṃ viharanti|
1325:48: hitāśayena sukhāśayena vinirmuktāśayena ca sarvākarāsu sattvārthakriyāsu prayujyante|
1325:53: avisaṃvādanādhyāśayena kṣiprābhijñā bhavanti teṣu teṣu kuśaladharmābhinirhāreṣu|
1325:56: sahajena punaradhyāśayena kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām|
1325:57: tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ prajñaptāḥ prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ|
1325:58: tasmādatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto'bhisaṃbhotsyante'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve ta ebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ|
